annotation.spannedText: My degree should speak and people should listen

classMention.mentionClass: My degree should speak and people should listen

annotation.spannedText: things ain't as good as we were lead to believe

classMention.mentionClass: things ain't as good as we were lead to believe

annotation.spannedText: There is still a lot of "mad" in our science

classMention.mentionClass: There is still a lot of "mad" in our science

annotation.spannedText: often the underlying science is good, but the delivery or application is often flawed or corners are cut, sometimes even knowingly

classMention.mentionClass: often the underlying science is good, but the delivery or application is often flawed or corners are cut, sometimes even knowingly

annotation.spannedText: this community as a whole is not nearly as pristine and as efficient (i.e. safe) in its practices as you seem to believe

classMention.mentionClass: this community as a whole is not nearly as pristine and as efficient (i.e. safe) in its practices as you seem to believe

annotation.spannedText: There are obviously individuals that are much more susceptible to problems when vaccines are administered than are others, just as certain foods or natural particles can maim some and not affect others

classMention.mentionClass: There are obviously individuals that are much more susceptible to problems when vaccines are administered than are others, just as certain foods or natural particles can maim some and not affect others

annotation.spannedText: These are real and possible outcomes that are rare for most, but more dangerous for a small percentage of folks that have autoimmune issues, allergies etc

classMention.mentionClass: These are real and possible outcomes that are rare for most, but more dangerous for a small percentage of folks that have autoimmune issues, allergies etc

annotation.spannedText: You can't make a blanket statement or rule that applies to the safety of all when it comes to vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: You can't make a blanket statement or rule that applies to the safety of all when it comes to vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Both sides of this argument have blind spots

classMention.mentionClass: Both sides of this argument have blind spots

annotation.spannedText: the world is not as wholesome and our science is not as pretty as many have led you to believe

classMention.mentionClass: the world is not as wholesome and our science is not as pretty as many have led you to believe
